predicate.note: Frames file for 'fawn' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 28, which has nothing to do with usage in wsj or anywhere else for that matter.

example.name: the one example
example.text: In this era of frantic competition for ad dollars, a lot of revenue-desperate magazines are getting pretty cozy with advertisers -- *trace* fawning over them in articles and offering pages of advertorial space.
